= Details =

Details of the PayPal function that will process the transaction and return a status code.

==Input Arrays==
===$order_details (array)===
  * $order_number (int8)
  * $sale_amount (int8)

===$customer_info (array)===
  * $customer_number
  * $billing_first_name
  * $billing_last_name

===$cc_info (array)===
  * $credit_card_number (int16)
  * $expiration_date (date)
  * $cvc_code (byte)


==Output Array==


==Constants==
  _Possible Values: Authorization, Credit, Delayed_Capture, Sale_
  * TransactionType = Sale
  _Possible Values: Live, Test_
  * TransactionMode = Test
